data.name: VR Health & Safety Trainings For Industry (Base Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Train your professional skills in GWPro VR trainings safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

This bundle includes:
- Work At Height VR Training
- Confined Space Entry VR Training
- Lockout Tagout (LOTO) VR Training
- Fire Safety VR Training (Office and Hangar)
- Hot Work VR Training

All trainings consist of 3 modes: Study, Training, Exam that provide step-by-step control of all VR activities. Voice-over and visual guides included.

VR Health & Safety Trainings For Industry were developed for professionals by professionals (including NEBOSH certified HSE). It is suitable for a wide variety of workers.

Send you feedback and ideas to improve training modules.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 8192 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Требуются 64-разрядные процессор и операционная система
